Minor in years. sanaγan dur --ky For one's expectations to be fulfilled. ta ene jabudal dur tusalaxu dur --besy. If you [come to] lend a hand in this matter . xojar nasun-a --ky. To attain the age of two. ykykyi --cy byky. To be on the point of dying, be near death. --ky ygei. To be wanting or insufficient , fall short of. kycy yly --ky. For the strength not to suffice. aγur --ky. To become angry, fly into a rage. ama --ky. To taste (food); to speak against or vilify someone. amin dur --ky. To be vital, be a matter of life and death. daγaraγad xanijad --cykyi. He caught cold and started to cough. dur-a --ky. To wish badly, have a burning desire. ebedcin --ky. To fall ill. inijedy -i-ky. To begin to laugh, burst into laughter. kysel degen --ky. To see one's wish fulfilled, reach ‘one's aim. uridaki daγan --ky ygei. Not as good as, less good than the former. xoruxai --ky. M0076 Meedex26; мандал
MANDAL [ S. Mandala, "anything round: disk, circle, orb"] n. Disk, circle, circumference, orb; a pictorial or plastic representation of the universe as conceived in Buddhist cosmography. The center of the mandala circle is usually occupied by the image of a deity, for the most parts a buddha in his palace, forming a square center and surrounded by his retinue (nøkyd). The whole mandala is filled with the pertinent emblems and symbols. It serves the priest in performing the liturgy of evoking the deity ( See bytygel). -- ariγulxu. To purify, perfume with incense, consecrate a temple. -- un sirege. Altar (Lamaist). acilal un -- . "Thanksgiving mandal," in its simplest form it is a metallic disk, often with a small elevation in the center, representing the cosmic Mount Sumeru (see symer). In performing the thanksgiving ritual the priest makes up small piles of fragments of precious stones , metals, etc. , reciting the prescribed text, after which he lifts up the whole as ‘a "cosmic" offering to the Buddha. caγan -- cidxuxu. To pour butter and brandy into the fire as a religious ceremony (performed during daytime). ebydyg yn -- . Knee-cap, patella. γal un --. Buddhist fire offering. kei jin --. Atmosphere. kyilsyn u --. Navel. naran u -- . Sun disk. saran u --. Moon disk. usun u --. Hydrosphere. xar-a -- cidxuxu. The same ceremony as described under caγan -- cidxuxu performed at night.

NIΓUR n. a) Face, image b) Surface; facade; front[age]; page c) Used in figuratiye and idiomatic expression, chiefly with the notion of honor, dignity, favor or shame -- caixu. To turn pale in the face. -- cirai. Face, physiognomy. -- tulxu. To confront -- uciraxu. To meet face to face, meet personally -- ulaixu To blush from shame, anger; to be angry; to be excited ( as over an argument) -- un deger-e on the surface baising un --. Facade of a building. siregen y --. Table top. -- aldaxu. To disgrace oneself, lose face. -- baraxu. To lose face -- bøke. Shameless, impudent, unblushing. -- ebdereky. To break up ( v.i., of a friendship) -- maγutai. With a scowling face; being dislike -- øgky. To give excessive praise, be overly kind, nice, considerate or respectful -- šangnaxu. To show consideration for someone or his wishes, express approval -- tal-a. "Face," cordial relations; favor, friendliness, friendship -- talbixu. To show favor, politeness; to yield for the sake of another -- xairalaxu. To give credit, praise, acknowledgment -- xalaxu. To be embarrassed. -- xaraxu. To do something for the sake of friendship; to act with bias -- ygei. Shameless, impudent. -- ygei bolγaxu. To dishonor, defame -- zuzaγan. Shameless, unblushing, impudent arban zil yn -- yzebe. [We are] facing the tenth year [of]; it is [our] tenth year. maγu kymyn dy -- øgcy bolxu ygei. One should not show undeserved kindness or consideration for a bad person. minu -- i xarazu tegyn i keltyrigyl. Pardon him for my sake minu -- tu maγuxai. It hurts my reputation or dignity.

N1758 Niket - Nikea нэг
NIGE(N) a) num. and adv. One; the same; once; expresses momentaneous aspect when used before a verb. b) Somebody; something; a certain; any. c) Single in kind, the same; undivided, united d) The first (of the month) -- ber. Alone -- busu. Not one; more than once. -- byri. Each individually. -- caγ. One hour; one o'clock. -- cy. See nigecy. -- dour-a. On the spot, right where one is; together. --(n) dy = nigedyger In the first place, first of all. --n graγ One week --n-e See nigen-e -- nige ber. One by one, one at atime, one after another, each individually, point by point. -- nigen degen. To each other, one another; mutually --sar-a. One month. --n tal-a ber ... nøgyge tal-a ber. On the one hand . . . on the other hand. -- udaγ-a. Once, one time --xarγuitu. Single track -- xaskirxu. To give a shout. ta – yze! Have a look! yneker -- saixan sanaγdaba. Really for once [I] felt very happy. -- Caγ tu. Once upon a time; at one o’clock --n edyr. Some day, one day; once. See c. aliba -- tal-a ber.
